user_instruction: 'Assist me in crafting a response to Dr. Emily Harris (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org) with some guidance on handling anxiety disorders. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please pull together some concise guidance and practical tips on treating anxiety disorders that I can include in a reply to Dr. Emily Harris (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org)? Feel free to reference the relevant notes and protocols in your Notion workspace, and let me know if there’s anything else you’d recommend adding.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
